name: Yak Throw
description: Fibre Tibet Yak Throw Super soft yak down woven into a 6 ply throw. 100% Tibetan yak wool. Bruin Tibetain (natural brown) with Moine Tibetain (Monk Red) endless knot. Pre-Order this item today! Click here and please provide us with your order and address! The estimated ship date is 12/08/2013. Note: You will not be charged for this item until it ships. Dimensions: 34 in x 64 in (86.36 cm x 162.56 cm)

name: Kawa Luri Bruin
description:
Light Brown Shawl with White Endless Knot.

Original Fibre Tibet Design.

The Endless Knot is a Buddhist Symbol that represents interdependence and eternal harmony.

100% Tibetan cashmere from Ngari Tibet. Woven in Nepal. 
Shawls are handmade by Himalayan artisans so there will be slight variations.

Dimensions: 27.5 in x 43.3 in (70 cm x 110 cm).

name: Pema Bruin
description:
Light Brown Shawl with Pink Lotus.

This is the Buddha's Lotus. It represents purity and enlightenment. 
This is Pema’s shawl, one of the founders of Noble Fibre.

100% Tibetan cashmere from Ngari Tibet. Woven in Nepal. 
Shawls are handmade by Himalayan artisans so there will be slight variations.

Dimensions: 27.5 in x 43.3 in (70 cm x 110 cm).

name: Ocean Blanc
description:
White Shawl with Ocean Waves by Jill Platner. 

Oceans and seas make up 72% of Earth. 
The world ocean is integral to all life.
Love the ocean and take care of it.
Gyatso is ocean in Tibetan, and HH the Dalai Lama is known as the Ocean of wisdom.

Designed by Jill Platner, artist, jeweler and sculptor and surfer for Fibre Tibet. 
www.jillplatner.com

Dimensions: 27.5 in x 43.3 in (70 cm x 110 cm).

100% Tibetan cashmere from Ngari Tibet.  Woven in Nepal.
